MEMORANDUM AND ORDER
GLASSER, District Judge.
Trial in this criminal action alleging conspiracy, securities fraud, and false statements is scheduled to begin on Monday, March 19, 2007. The government has moved in limine pursuant to Federal Rule of Evidence 404(b) ("Rule 404(b)") and the Second Circuit's opinion in United States v. Towne, 870 F.2d 880 (2d Cir.1989), cert. denied 490 U.S. 1101, 109 S. Ct. 2456, 104 L. Ed. 2d 1010 (1989), to admit evidence regarding several uncharged acts or *563 crimes of various defendants. For the reasons stated below, the government's motion is granted in part, and decision is deferred to trial in part.
